value.title: Artificial neural networks modeled on real brains can perform cognitive tasks
value.excerpt: A new study shows that artificial intelligence networks based on human brain connectivity can perform cognitive tasks efficiently.

value.title: Eden AI launches platform to unify ML APIs
value.excerpt: Eden AI, a startup developing a service to unify disparate AI APIs from vendors like Amazon Web Services, has launched a new platform.

value.title: How machine learning could help develop cures for COVID-19 and other diseases

value.title: Social Factors in Machine Learning Models Aid CVD Prediction
value.excerpt: Machine learning approaches are useful for cardiovascular disease prediction, and model performance is improved with inclusion of social determinants of health, according to a review published online July 27 in the American Journal of Preventive Medicine .

value.title: Accenture promotes machine learning growth with world’s largest private AWS DeepComposer Battle of the Bands League
value.excerpt: Accenture is known for pioneering innovative solutions to achieve customer success by using artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) powered solutions with AWS services. To keep teams updated with latest ML services, Accenture seeks to gamify hands-on learning. One such event, AWS DeepComposer

value.title: Doubling the performance of visual recognition AI
value.excerpt: Prof. Sunghoon Im, from the Department of Information & Communication Engineering, DGIST, developed an artificial intelligence(AI) neural network module that can separate and convert environmental information in the form of complex images using deep learning.

value.title: DeepMind’s new system could be a step towards general AI, but there’s a way to go
value.excerpt: DeepMind claim to have taken the “first steps to train an agent capable of playing many different games without needing human interaction data,”.

value.title: Laser-Driven Ion Acceleration With Deep Learning Neural Networks
value.excerpt: While advances in machine learning over the past decade have made significant impacts in applications such as image classification, natural language processing, and pattern recognition, scientific endeavors have only just begun to leverage this technology.

value.title: Neural network model shows why people with autism read facial expressions differently
value.excerpt: People with autism spectrum disorder have difficulty interpreting facial expressions. Using a neural network model that reproduces the brain on a computer, a group of researchers based at Tohoku University have unraveled how this comes to be.

value.title: Tesla teases future products using artificial intelligence not related to its electric vehicle fleet
value.excerpt: In the invite to its AI Day, Tesla is teasing the use of artificial intelligence beyond its electric vehicle fleet. What do you think they’re talking about? As we have reported over the last week, Tesla is preparing for its upcoming AI Day on August 19.

value.title: Abacus.AI Brings Machine Learning Into the Hands of Every Company
value.excerpt: Abacus.AI was founded by Google, Amazon and Uber Alumnus with vast experience in building machine learning solutions at these companies, with a mission to put cutting edge machine learning into the hands of every company and help them extract meaningful insights from their data.

value.title: Spell unveils deep learning operations platform to cut AI training costs
value.excerpt: Spell takes wraps off deep learning operations (DLOps) platform that promises to reduce cost of building more advanced AI models.

value.title: Machine Learning Blood Analysis Could Predict Schizophrenia Risk
value.excerpt: An innovative strategy that analyzes a region of the genome offers the possibility of early diagnosis of schizophrenia, reports a research team.

value.title: The ‘Subscription Goldilocks Zone’ Is Within Reach For Merchants Using AI & ML
value.excerpt: The subscription “Goldilocks” syndrome is something that sticky.io CEO Brian Bogosian tells PYMNTS subscription commerce companies can use AI and ML to solve.

value.title: Meet Cassie, the first two-legged robot to set a running record using machine learning
value.excerpt: Cassie, a robot invented at Oregon State University in Corvallis, has set a record as the first two-legged robot to use machine learning to control its running gait on outdoor terrain, the university said.

value.title: Gapsquare, a pioneer of machine learning into gender pay disparity, is acquired by XpertHR
value.excerpt: Inequalities between women and men in the workplace have been exacerbated during the COVID-19 pandemic and are likely to persist in the near future, according to the International Labour Organization (ILO).

value.title: OpenAI debuts Python-based Triton for GPU-powered machine learning
value.excerpt: OpenAI, the nonprofit venture whose professed mission is the ethical advancement of artificial intelligence (AI), has released the first version of the Triton language, an open source project that allows researchers to write GPU-powered deep learning projects without needing to know the intricacies of GPU programming for machine learning.

value.title: Levi-Strauss’ Dr. Katia Walsh on why diversity in AI and ML is non-negotiable
value.excerpt: Levi's chief strategy and artificial intelligence officer talks about the power of diversity and using technology for good.
